text: how to import bundled file in custom code node js env?
Is the field you're trying to update a date picker field?
<@U02GRR195V3> Here's a Loom where I update a contact's date picker property (close date) using a date specified in a workflow: <https://www.loom.com/share/32211d4e9b664b6ca7e20e166e915fe3>

You can use custom code to send a request to a serverless function that has the crypto package loaded and then have the serverless function return the response. Unfortunately HubSpot doesn't have the vm package preloaded, if they did you could include packages using http, see this stackoverflow post for more information: <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7809397/how-to-require-from-url-in-node-js>
So I take it that it has to be stored a string of milliseconds?
Correct, even through the property isn't a date and time field (these can only be create through the api) you have to pass through in milliseconds
